p: Bodyweight loss of the diabetic control group was significant at 7 th day and 14th day, with percentage decrement of 12% and 19.6% compared to the corresponding baseline bodyweight, respectively. Between groups analysis depicted that bodyweight loss of the diabetic control mice was significant at 7 th day and 14 th day compared to the aqueous fraction treated groups, normal control group, and GLC-treated group ( Table 8).
